snippet: The small gains added to worries about slow economic growth in the third quarter.
abstract: Commerce Department reports wholesale stockpiles rose just 0.1 percent in July from June; that follows 0.3 percent monthly decline; sales rose 0.1 percent; tepid gains could add to worries about slower economic growth in third quarter.
lead_paragraph: The small gains added to worries about slow economic growth in the third quarter.

headline.main: Wholesale Stockpiles Rose Slightly Last Month
headline.print_headline: Wholesale Stockpiles Rose Slightly Last Month
